required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Food-Effect Study of Hemay022 in Healthy Participants
clinical_study.official_title: A PhaseⅠFood-Effect Study of Hemay022 in Healthy Subjects

lead_sponsor.agency: Tianjin Hemay Oncology Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd

clinical_study.source: Tianjin Hemay Oncology Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of this study is to determine the effect of food in healthy participants on the bioavailability of Hemay022 following single dose administration with and without a meal.

primary_outcome.description: Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration for Hemay022
Time to Reach the Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Cmax) for Hemay022
AUC 0-t: Area Under the Concentration-time Curve From Zero (Pre-dose) to Time of Last Quantifiable Concentration for Hemay022
Area Under the Plasma Concentration-time Curve from Time 0 to Infinite Time for Hemay022

arm_group.description: Hemay022 Period 1, Fasted control → Period 2, Fed control
Hemay022 Period 1, Fed control → Period 2, Fasted control

intervention.description: Participants will receive a single oral dose of Hemay022 tablet in fasted condition on Day 1 of treatment period 1 followed by a single oral dose of Hemay022 tablet in fed condition on Day 8 of treatment period 2. A washout period of 7 days will be maintained between the 2 treatment periods.

Participants will receive a single oral dose of Hemay022 tablet in fed condition on Day 1 of treatment period 1 followed by a single oral dose of Hemay022 tablet in fasted condition on Day 8 of treatment period 2. A washout period of 7 days will be maintained between the 2 treatment periods.

facility.name: Union Hospital affiliated to Tongji Medical College of Huazhong University of Science and Technology
